content: the autumn sun scarf designed by jellina verhoeff is a prime example of when a scheepjes yarn and a pattern work together in perfect harmony the subtly heathered scheepjes metropolis yarn claims the attention it deserves in the beautiful braid-like relief motif the front post stitches are framed elegantly by a row of double crochets creating a trendy look and feel for all to enjoy and with 80 colours to choose from the options are endless **yarn requirements** scheepjes metropolis 75% merino extra fine 25% nylon 50g/200m yarn a 039 delhi x 5 ball the pattern is available as a digital download in dutch german french swedish spanish and english uk and us terms the pattern is also available as a hardcopy booklet in dutch english german and swedish available from scheepjes retailers
